title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta.
Cook the bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese together.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or broil the chicken until cooked.
Prepare the tomato-based sauce with butter and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and mix well.
Serve hot.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Spicy ground beef served in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef with spices and onions.
Warm the taco shells in oven or pan.
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients together.
Add eggs and butter, and mix until smooth.
Pour batter into cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Cool and frost with chocolate frosting.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve chilled.
